insert into product (prod_no, user_no, prodname, prodtype, beginshow, endshow, beginrez, endrez, showtime, viewtime, viewgrade, cancelinfo, notice, status ) values (#{prodNo}, 2, #{prodName}, #{prodType}, #{beginShow}, #{endShow}, #{beginRez}, #{endRez}, to_date(#{showTime},'HH24:MI'), #{viewTime}, #{viewGrade}, #{cancelInfo}, #{notice}, #{status} )

select p.prod_no prodNo, u.user_no userNo, h.hall_no hallNo, p.prodname prodName, p.prodtype prodType, p.beginshow beginShow, p.endshow endShow, p.beginrez beginRez, p.endrez endRez, p.showtime showTime, p.viewtime viewTime, p.viewgrade viewGrade, p.notice notice, p.cancelinfo cancelInfo, p.status status, p.posterpath posterPath
from product p, hall h, users u where p.hall_no = h.hall_no and p.user_no = u.user_no and p.prod_no = #{prodNo}
mapper.update: update product set prodname = #{prodName}, prodtype = #{prodType}, beginshow = #{beginShow}, endshow = #{endShow}, beginrez = #{beginRez}, endrez = #{endRez}, showtime = to_date(#{showTime},'HH24:MI'), viewtime = #{viewTime}, viewgrade = #{viewGrade}, notice = #{notice}, cancelinfo = #{cancelInfo} where prod_no = #{prodNo};
